summary: Two friends travel to a ski resort, with one looking to hit the slopes, while the other spends time trying to pick up women.
cast: Jim Carrey|Alan Thicke|Dick Gautier|Ziggy Lorenc|Rod Hebron|Jean Laplac|Randi Brooks|Toni St. Vincent|Bita Jaretta|Bruce Carr|Paul Lodi|Jean-Claude Killy|Damian Lee|Edwin Halsnes|Barry Stone|Robert Gage|Danny Marks|David Lewis|Steve Sexton|Mike Utley|Brian Bell|Jon Bojicic|Tamara Champlin|Rita Coolidge|Ronnie Hawkins
title: Copper Mountain
